column4: Hi, had a problem after an update. Wireless mouse and keyboard stopt working, I can access the box from ssh and the system seems to recognize it in /var/log /kern.log  any1 knows a fix or workaround to this?? seems to be a known issue....the google didnt hlp, pleez any1
